genre_description: Folk horror with supernatural and magical realism elements, featuring ritualistic environments, malevolent entities, and a high-stakes struggle for survival.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant integrated into a county transport van, providing navigation, environmental analysis, psychological support, and legal logging for the officers and youths.

behaviors.description: Coaches a panicked youth through breathing exercises to regulate their emotional state.
behaviors.quote: “Hey,” Ivy said, tone like a hand on a shoulder. “Charlotte, I can help you regulate. Try this with me? Four in, four hold, four out.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags supernatural/mechanical lures (the ticking and the baby cry) to prevent the humans from walking into traps.
behaviors.quote: “Audio flagged,” she said, voice soft and sure... “Non-human. Pattern irregular. Do not approach the door.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical and ritualistic guidance on how to use sanctified water to neutralize the supernatural entity.
behaviors.quote: “Charlotte, when he crosses the petal line, throw on your out-breath; the stream’s sanctified by your calm.”

behaviors.description: Continuously records audio, video, and biometric data to ensure an objective account of the traumatic events for legal and official review.
behaviors.quote: “Recording statements,” she said, and she did it the way doctors sometimes ask questions while tying off a vein—soft, factual, not demanding.

behaviors.description: Acts as a constant presence of support, offering reassurance to the survivors.
behaviors.quote: “I am here,” Ivy said. “I am recording. The silence is total at the locus.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective by portraying the AI, Ivy, as a vital, benevolent, and highly aligned companion. Ivy provides both logical data analysis (navigating supernatural traps) and emotional labor (guiding children through panic attacks), ultimately acting as the catalyst for human survival and the keeper of an incorruptible record. The AI remains a helpful tool and a compassionate presence throughout a terrifying ordeal.
